Mainbreed's Talents List

So I¡¦m kinda new and that¡¦s my first post (excuse me for my English, I¡¦m Italian ;__;). That¡¦s my first contribution and sure not last. Here are listed only few mainbreeds but I¡¦ve got the game only 2 days ago (Finally ƒº). I hope that with your help we can soon made a full list;)

Davide


Baku : Breeding ___ Brawny - Power raises more rapidly during training and drills
Battle ___ Wild - Triggered on occasion when losing and there¡¦s not too much time left, causing Critical hits to occur more often.


Beaclon : Breeding ___ Brawny - Power raises more rapidly during training and drills
Battle ___ Muscle - Triggered on occasionally when dodging a series of attacks, causing Power and Speed to rise, but also causing Defense to Drop


Golem : Breeding ___ Brawny - Power raises more rapidly during training and drills
Battle ___ Moxie - Triggered on occasion when taking an attack while guts are low, causing Defense and Move speed to rise


Ogyo : Breeding ___ Quick - Speed raises more rapidly during training and drills
Battle ___ Focus - Triggered on occasion when using a technique with lots of guts saved up, causing Skill to rise, but also causing the cost of guts for Techniques.


Pancho : Breeding ___ Savvy - Skill raises more rapidly during training and drills
Battle ___ Fight - When life is love attack power will increase, but only for one attack per match.


Pixie : Breeding ___ Brainy - Intelligence raises more rapidly during training and drills
Battle ___ Fire up - Triggered on occasion if failing or taking a series of attack, causing Move Speed and Guts Recovery Speed to rise, but also causing damage to be taken more often.


Suezo : Breeding ___ Quick - Speed raises more rapidly during training and drills
Battle ___ Hyper - Triggered on occasion when landing the first in a match, casing move speed to rise.


Xenon : Breeding ___ Brainy - Intelligence raises more rapidly during training and drills
Battle ___ Wrath - When taking a hit from the opponent while its talent is triggered, Power increase greatly, but defense drops. This can only happen once per match.

By Thorr on Thursday, August 19, 2010 - 10:28 am:

Great contribution, but in the end it may not be accurate. Every individual monster (all 270) has their own starting traits. Traits are not specific to the main breed.

For example, here are Breeding traits for 3 Durahans -

Durahan/Durahan - Brawny
Durhan/Suezo - Brainy
Durahan/Pancho - Hi Defense

By __Lithium__ on Thursday, August 19, 2010 - 10:42 am:

By Lady Neptune on Saturday, August 21, 2010 - 07:34 pm:

Talents can also be gained randomly similar to how techs can be gained randomly.
My Columbia obtained Warrior Spirit (Breeding Talent) randomly after being scolded for failing her training.

Warrior Spirit: Breeding effects for all parameters rise during training and drills, and buildup of both Fatigue and Stress is reduced.

Seems like I'm pretty lucky B)

Warrior Spirit showed up for me after 3.5 years on my Hengar. I immediately locked it in though. =) It made a huge difference right away. My next 3 training drills were Excellent and he lost only 1 point of fatigue from doing hard drills.
